title: Crime Alert 02.06.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 02.06.19
description:
Shocking video shows Michael Jackson smirking and laughing during deposition on sexual abuse claims. Idaho nurse to enter a plea deal with prosecutors in connection with the disappearance of Colorado mom Kelsey Berreth. Brad Pitt backed charity being sued over homes built for Katrina victims.
